remarks: An isometry is a homeomorphism on the induced topology.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ismtyhmeo.1 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` M ) $.
ismtyhmeo.2 $e |- K = ( MetOpen ` N ) $.
ismtyhmeo $p |- ( ( M e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ N e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) -> ( M Ismty N ) C_ ( J Homeo K ) ) $.
